description:
Charming 1 bedroom apartment in a safe part of Manhattan. Only a few blocks from Central Park in the prestigious Upper East Side of Manhattan. Very safe, quiet neighborhood with restaurants, markets, and attractions all around you. Sleep in silence as this is not a noisy area but only footsteps away from all the excitement of Central Park, Radio City and all the magic New York has to offer. Located near the 6 subway and minutes from midtown. Feel like a true New Yorker in a classy area.

Perfect for couples, buisness travelers, couples with small child.
5g wifi through out
Heat
Xmas Tree to put you in the spirit! 
1 Bedroom: 2 windows, dresser, desk flat screen smart tv, Apple monitor ready to hook up to laptop if you need to work at the desk! 
Livingroom: 60'' Flat screen smart tv, reclining suede couch, xmas tree, window
Bathroom with stand up shower, vanity
Kitchen: Stove, Refridgerator, Sink, Utensils

Upper east side is the upscale neighborhood of Manhattan. Right near Central Park, and all New York has to offer. Play in the city and go home to a safe, quiet, charming neighborhood.

The Upper East Side, sometimes abbreviated as UES, is a neighborhood in the borough of Manhattan in New York City, between Central Park/Fifth Avenue, 59th Street, the East River, and 96th Street. The area incorporates several smaller neighborhoods, including Lenox Hill, Carnegie Hill, and Yorkville. Once known as the Silk Stocking District, it is now one of the most affluent neighborhoods in New York City.

6 subway
bus 
uber
taxi
please turn lights off when you leave.
name: Classic Upper East Side Manhattan
